Enhance your Hacker News browsing experience with the Hacker News Theme Switcher!
https://github.com/nishammahsin/hn-theme-switcher
Key Features:
• Multiple themes including Dark, Solarized Light, Solarized Dark, Oceanic, and Monokai
• Easy-to-use theme selector directly on the Hacker News page
• Remembers your theme preference across sessions
• Improves readability and reduces eye strain with carefully chosen color schemes
• Quick enable/disable functionality via extension popup

How to Use:
1. Install the extension
2. Visit Hacker News
3. Select your preferred theme from the dropdown menu in the top navigation bar
4. Enjoy Hacker News in your chosen color scheme!

Perfect for night-time browsing or simply customizing your Hacker News experience to your liking. Whether you prefer a dark theme for low-light environments or a vibrant theme to energize your browsing, Hacker News Theme Switcher has you covered.

Developed with love for the Hacker News community. Open source and actively maintained.

Note: This extension only modifies the appearance of Hacker News and does not alter any functionality or content.
